itemDescription: former  head of the chemistry department at Woolwich Polytechnic; author

wikipedia_page.main: Arthur Israel Vogel   (22 December 1905 – 1966) was a British chemist known for his Chemistry textbooks. He became the head of the chemistry department at Woolwich Polytechnic at the age of 27.

response: * Arthur Vogel (photographer) (1868–1962), German merchant, photographer and publisher
